item.name: The Standard
item.description: Two (2) eggs any-style, home fries, bacon or sausage

item.name: Hash n’ Eggs
item.description: Our famous hash made with corned beef, pastrami, potatoes, peppers and onions. Topped with two (2) eggs your way

item.name: Cheesy Omelet
item.description: Omelet filled with your choice of American, Swiss, Cheddar or Mozzarella cheese

item.name: L.E.O. Scramble
item.description: Scramble of Nova Lox (smoked salmon), Eggs and Onions

item.name: Salami and Eggs
item.description: Grilled Hebrew National salami scrambled with three (3) eggs

item.name: Chili Cheese Omelet
item.description: Omelet filled with meat and bean chili, green onions and cheddar cheese

item.name: Build Your Omelet
item.description: Choose any three (3) items: spinach, tomato, onions, green peppers, mushrooms, avocado, bacon, ham, sausage, feta, cheddar, American or Swiss

item.name: Reuben
item.description: Hot pastrami, corned beef, or turkey w/sauerkraut, swiss cheese and thousand island on rye

item.name: Rachel
item.description: Hot pastrami, corned beef, or turkey w/cole slaw, swiss cheese and thousand island on rye
